//Bipartite Matching
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define vi vector<int> 
#define pb push_back
using namespace std;

vi graph[108];
queue<int> q;
bool seen[108];
int match[108];
bool bpm(int src)
{
	int v,i;
	for(i=0;i<graph[src].size();i++)
	{
		v=graph[src][i];
		if(seen[v]==0)
		{
			seen[v]=1;
			if(match[v]<0 || bpm(match[v]))
			{
				match[v]=src;
				return true;
			}
			
			
		}
	}
	return false;
}
int main()
{
	int t,n,m,i,j,x,y,ans=0;
	scanf("%d %d",&n,&t);
	
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d %d",&x,&y);
		graph[x].pb(y);
	}
	memset(match,-1,sizeof(match));
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		memset(seen,0,sizeof(seen));
		if(bpm(i))
		{
			ans++;
		}
		
	}
	printf("%d",ans);
	return 0;
}
